name: autometa's FOLIO
author: JorgeAmVF

sections.description:
autometa’s FOLIO is a simple plugin that uses the following shortcodes:

  • [pfcats] = to reproduce portfolio categories;
  • [pfatts] = to reproduce portfolio attributes;
  • [folio] = to generate a portfolio taxonomies cloud.

autometa’s FOLIO is a standalone component of autometa shortcodes pack.
sections.installation:
1. Install it from Dashboard/Plugins/Add Plugins or download it to your plugin folder;
  2. Activate it from Dashboard/Plugins/Installed Plugins;
  3. Write the following shortcodes in text fields: [pfcats], [pfatts], [folio].
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install it from Dashboard/Plugins/Add Plugins or download it to your plugin folder;
  2. Activate it from Dashboard/Plugins/Installed Plugins;
  3. Write the following shortcodes in text fields: [pfcats], [pfatts], [folio].

Plugin Features

autometa reproduces metadata information automatically via shorcodes in general, autometa’s FOLIO reproduces potfolio taxonomy-related data in special.

How To

Just write one or more of the following shortcodes inside a text field and between brackets as usual: [pfcats] and/or [pfatts] and/or [folio].

CSS Style Selectors

  • #pfcats = [pfcats] ID;
  • #pfatts = [pfatts] ID;
  • #folio = [folio] ID;
  • .autometa = autometa class.

PHP Functions Reference

  • add_shortcode()
  • get_the_term_list()
  • wp_tag_cloud()
